dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Kazhydromet, um, they've got this forecast for Women's Day. They call it a "surprise." Is that, like, actually a good thing or what, B?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Kazhydromet, um, they've got this forecast for Women's Day. They call it a surprise. Is that, like, actually a good thing or what, B?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet meteorologists have released a weather forecast for Kazakhstan for March 6, 7, and 8. According to the forecast, ahead of International Women's Day, the weather seems to have a "surprise" for residents of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: What? No. Absolutely not. Rain, snow, gusty winds? That is not, uh, a good surprise for a holiday, A.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What? No. Absolutely not. Rain, snow, gusty winds? That is not, uh, a good surprise for a holiday, A.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Although these cyclones will bring rising temperatures in the northern regions, accompanied by precipitation in the form of rain and snow, as well as gusty winds...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But they said rising temperatures. I mean, that's, you know, objectively better than freezing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But they said rising temperatures. I mean, that's, you know, objectively better than freezing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Although these cyclones will bring rising temperatures in the northern regions...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: "Slightly positive temperatures will not be strongly felt." Hello? That's code for "it's still pretty miserable out there."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Slightly positive temperatures will not be strongly felt. Hello? That's code for it's still pretty miserable out there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the slightly positive temperatures will not be strongly felt," the statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's just weather, though. Northwestern cyclones, uh, bringing some precipitation. That happens.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just weather, though. Northwestern cyclones, uh, bringing some precipitation. That happens.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the next three days, a series of northwestern cyclones will shape weather conditions across most of the country. "Although these cyclones will bring rising temperatures in the northern regions, accompanied by precipitation in the form of rain and snow...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But to call it a "surprise" when it's, like, messy and cold? That's just sarcastic, in my opinion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But to call it a surprise when it's, like, messy and cold? That's just sarcastic, in my opinion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I think you're reading too much into it. They're just forecasting. The temperatures are rising in the north.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I think you're reading too much into it. They're just forecasting. The temperatures are rising in the north.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Although these cyclones will bring rising temperatures in the northern regions...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: While you're dodging snow and getting buffeted by wind. Yeah, a real party.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: While you're dodging snow and getting buffeted by wind. Yeah, a real party.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...accompanied by precipitation in the form of rain and snow, as well as gusty winds...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, what, they should, like, fake a sunny forecast for the sake of the holiday?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, what, they should, like, fake a sunny forecast for the sake of the holiday?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but don't call miserable weather a "surprise." That's just, um, misleading.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but don't call miserable weather a surprise. That's just, um, misleading.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I don't know. I think you're just being cynical. It's just a forecast.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I don't know. I think you're just being cynical. It's just a forecast.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I think they're being cynical. A "surprise" for Women's Day? This ain't it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I think they're being cynical. A surprise for Women's Day? This ain't it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Maybe! Maybe they should just say "bad weather expected."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Maybe! Maybe they should just say bad weather expected.
